items.sentence: I've met Tom's sister, but I haven't met his brothers.
I hear that even taxi drivers often get lost in Tokyo.
He had not been in Tokyo a month when he got homesick.
If Tom had told me the truth, I would've forgiven him.
If Tom had had time, I'm sure he would've helped Mary.
This is one of the trees that I want to have cut down.
It saddens me that all we can do is sit here and wait.
Tom unscrewed the cap of his canteen and took a drink.
How many major terrorist attacks were there last year?
Tom was very satisfied with the work Mary did for him.
